dmca.title: Infringing material on Theodorelee.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: James White [mailto:white@signalnoise.com] 
Sent: Friday, August 12, 2005 8:54 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Infringing material on Theodorelee.com


Hello.
 
I am writing to you regarding the copyright infringement performed by a
client of yours. Theodore Lee (http://www.theodorelee.com) has infringed on
many of my online materials including my website design, HTML code,
stylesheet code, and duplicated images.
 
This infringement happened earlier this week (August 9) and I contacted this
person without response as he continues to use my hard work as his own.
 
I have attached an official DMCA notice which outlines specifically what is
being used illegally, and I hope to have the infringing files disabled as
soon as possible.
 
Thank-you so much for your understanding.
 
-- james
 
..................................
James White
Signalnoise.com
www.signalnoise.com
